sql-select.name: GetInstanceNetworkStatus
get disk networks statistics
sql-select.description: Information about the connections established to this instance of SQL Server and the details of each connection
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT getdate() AS [EventTime] ,ISNULL(t.[net_transport], N'?') AS [net_transport] ,SUM(ISNULL(CONVERT([BIGINT], t.[num_reads]), 0)) AS [num_reads] ,SUM(ISNULL(CONVERT([BIGINT], t.[num_writes]), 0)) AS [num_writes] ,SUM(ISNULL(CONVERT([BIGINT], t.[num_reads]), 0) * t.[net_packet_size]) AS [bytes_reads] ,SUM(ISNULL(CONVERT([BIGINT], t.[num_writes]), 0) * t.[net_packet_size]) AS [bytes_writes] FROM [sys].[dm_exec_connections] t GROUP BY ISNULL(t.[net_transport], N'?') ;

sqlite_statements.sqlite_statement: INSERT INTO [hist].[h_ServerInstance] ( [d_Query_id] ,[d_ServerInstance_id] ,[ServerInstanceName] ,[ConnectionName] ) SELECT MIN(dQ.[rowid]) ,MIN(dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id]) ,dSI.[ServerInstanceName] ,MIN(IFNULL(dSI.[ConnectionName], '')) FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [d_ServerInstance] dSI ON dSI.[rowid] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[ServerInstanceName] = dSI.[ServerInstanceName] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dSI.[ServerInstanceName] IS NOT NULL AND hSI.[rowid] IS NULL GROUP BY dSI.[ServerInstanceName] ;

UPDATE [hist].[h_ServerInstance] SET [d_Query_id] = @d_Query_id ,[d_ServerInstance_id] = ( SELECT MIN(dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id]) FROM [d_Query] dQ WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] IS NOT NULL ) WHERE [ServerInstanceName] = ( SELECT MIN(dSI.[ServerInstanceName]) FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [d_ServerInstance] dSI ON dSI.[rowid] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dSI.[ServerInstanceName] IS NOT NULL ) AND [d_ServerInstance_id] != ( SELECT MIN(dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id]) FROM [d_Query] dQ WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] IS NOT NULL ) ;

INSERT INTO [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] ( [d_Query_id] ,[h_ServerInstance_id] ,[EventDay] ,[EventTime] ,[net_transport] ,[num_reads] ,[num_writes] ,[bytes_reads] ,[bytes_writes] ,[EventTimeLast] ,[num_reads_last] ,[num_writes_last] ,[bytes_reads_last] ,[bytes_writes_last] ) SELECT dQ.[rowid] ,hSI.[rowid] ,date(t.[EventTime]) ,t.[EventTime] ,t.[net_transport] ,t.[num_reads] ,t.[num_writes] ,t.[bytes_reads] ,t.[bytes_writes] ,hINSB.[EventTime] ,hINSB.[num_reads] ,hINSB.[num_writes] ,hINSB.[bytes_reads] ,hINSB.[bytes_writes] FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] INNER JOIN [report].[${GetInstanceNetworkStatus}$_${1}$] t ON t.[d_Query_id] = dQ.[rowid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatusBaseline] hINSB ON hINSB.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND hINSB.[net_transport] = t.[net_transport] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatus] hINS ON hINS.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND hINS.[EventTime] = t.[EventTime] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND hINS.[rowid] IS NULL ;

INSERT OR REPLACE INTO [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatusBaseline] ( [d_Query_id] ,[h_ServerInstance_id] ,[EventDay] ,[EventTime] ,[net_transport] ,[num_reads] ,[num_writes] ,[bytes_reads] ,[bytes_writes] ) SELECT dQ.[rowid] ,hSI.[rowid] ,date(t.[EventTime]) ,t.[EventTime] ,t.[net_transport] ,t.[num_reads] ,t.[num_writes] ,t.[bytes_reads] ,t.[bytes_writes] FROM [d_Query] dQ INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = dQ.[d_ServerInstance_id] INNER JOIN [report].[${GetInstanceNetworkStatus}$_${1}$] t ON t.[d_Query_id] = dQ.[rowid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [hist].[h_InstanceNetworkStatusBaseline] hINSB ON hINSB.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND hINSB.[net_transport] = t.[net_transport] AND hINSB.[EventTime] = t.[EventTime] WHERE dQ.[rowid] = @d_Query_id AND hINSB.[rowid] IS NULL ;
